title: Customer Experience Practical Skills Enhancement: Scientific Competency Through Co-Creation-Based Blended Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design three or more digital/analog learning tools for scientific problem-solving with peers and instructors.
Learners can perform data collection-analysis-visualization processes with over 80% accuracy through weekly science projects.
Learners can produce learning content incorporating peer feedback two or more times using smartphone-based collaboration platforms (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
